page.title: 02INDEPENDENT ED.11+:WOKINGHAM
page.content: {Luckley-Oakfield}(Education for girls) ---------------- This is a school for 250{girls}to the age of 18, over a hundred being {full or weekly boarders.}Entrance is by examination and interview. The school is situated in 22 acres of grounds less than a mile from Wokingham. The{fees}are Â£975 for boarders; Â£945 for weekly boarders; Â£605 for day girls,all per term. There is a charge for Needlework, Cookery, Arts and Crafts.{Extra subjects including riding, dancing, tennis coaching,French conversation and piano and other musical instrument tuition are available at extra cost. The school welcomes girls of all denominations, but it has a{Church of {England}foundation.There is an outdoor swimming pool and the girls have to wear a uniform.
